The siting, design and excessive size of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a damaging loss of outlook and daylight, resulting in a harmful impact to neighbouring properties especially no.38 Heath Road.  As such it would constitute an unneighbourly development and is contrary to: The National Planning Policy Framework (DLUHC, 2021), Policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), policies CP2 and CP3 of the Local LDF Core Strategy (2010), policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide DPD (2011), The Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2012),  and policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of The LBBD Draft Local Plan (2021).
